document_data.name: Ildamoar Hardcastle
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite dragon annual/2000/After the Dragon: The Kingdom of Cormyr Today|67}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Ildamoar Hardcastle''' was the head of the [[Cormyr]]ian noble [[Hardcastle]] family in the latter half of the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was a vigorous man even into his twilight years.
document_data.Relationships: Ildamoar was staunchly loyal to the ruling [[Obarskyr]] family, especially [[Alusair Obarskyr]]. He had two sons, [[Guldrin Hardcastle|Guldrin]] and [[Rathtar Hardcastle|Rathtar]].
document_data.History:
When the "Devil Dragon" [[Nalavarauthatoryl]] invaded Cormyr in {{YearlinkName|1371}}, Ildamoar was among the nobles who pledged troops to aid in the realm's defense. He lost both his sons in the fighting.

Alusair Obarskyr personally informed Ildamoar of his sons' passing, for which he was eternally grateful. The two became friends, with Alusair often inviting Ildamoar to parties with younger nobles.
